snippet.title: Tales of Old: Dominus | First Look | indie.io
snippet.description:
Wishlist Tales of Old: Dominus now on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2761000/Tales_of_Old_Dominus/ 

Story-driven open-world RPG, with realistic brutal combat and a deep stealth system. Craft items, build your camps, upgrade villages and manage them properly, claim locations under your banner. You decide how you will ascent to power in medieval society.
